articles.author: Myriam Toua
articles.title: Covid vaccine graph shows why UK is better off OUT of Europe after vaccine shambles - Daily Express
articles.description: THE UK is better off out of Europe, according to one graph which shows how lacklustre the vaccine rollout has been in the European Union.

articles.title: France and Germany will renew attempt to force UK tourists to quarantine in Europe - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Currently, each EU state is free to impose its own coronavirus restrictions on travellers arriving from abroad
articles.content:
Official statistics show more than 60 per cent of adults in the UK are now fully vaccinated, and five out of every six adults (84 per cent) have had at least one dose.

articles.author: hindustantimes.com
articles.title: Covishield excluded from new EU Covid 'Green Pass' eligibility list even after WHO approval - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Covishield, a version of the AstraZeneca Covid vaccine manufactured by Pune-based Serum Institute of India (SII), has not been approved by the EMA for the European market. | World News
articles.content: Travellers vaccinated with Covishield may not be eligible for the European Unions Green Pass that will be available for use from July 1. Many EU member states have started issuing the digital vaccine… [+2355 chars]
